name: Little Witch Astrea
description:
Play as Astrea, a little witch with not too much power. She can puff out a fireball, but that's about it. Collect the mana coins to unlock the door to the boss to win the game.

Sorry, but this game got into crunch time, so some of the menus are lacking in quality, and it wasn't as big as I wanted it to be.  Controls are also bad for firing. It's wasd to move and left click to fire (or left control if you want to use a key.)

If I can after the jam, I'll polish it up a bit.
